Package com.socrata.api

Provides objects that implement all the major Socrata operations (verbs).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpLowLevel
    Class to handle all the low level HTTP operations.
    Soda2Base
    A base class that wraps some common SODA 2 behaviours around an HttpLowLevel object.
    Soda2Consumer
    Class to issue SODA2 queries against a service.
    Soda2Producer
    API for sending requests to the SODA server for adding/removing/modifying objects in the datasets.
    SodaDdl
    Provides APIs for altering the shape of a dataset, whether that be adding columns, removing columns, etc.
    SodaImporter
    This class contains all the apis for using the full file import/update apis.
    SodaTokenFilter
    A client filter for Jersey that will add the SODA2 token to the responses.
    SodaWorkflow
    Implements the methods important to using the Soda workflow.

Package com.socrata.api Description

Provides objects that implement all the major Socrata operations (verbs). The actual objects used as return values or parameters are defined in the com.socrata.model package. The major objects are:
  • Soda2Consumer api is used for querying a Socrata dataset. The primary way to query is to use SoQL (the SODA Query Language)
  • Soda2Producer api is used for adding/updating/removing rows to a dataset using the new SODA2 mechanisms (which don't require a publish)
  • SodaImporter api is used for adding a new datasets from CSVs
  • SodaDDL api is used for CRUD operations on datasets
  • SodaWorkflow api defines a number of calls required for the workflow of publishing Datasets
In addition, there are a few helper objects: Soda2Base + HttpLowLevel that are mainly to handle general network operations.
